Title: Successful login with valid credentials
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click login button

Title: Login with invalid email
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter invalid email | Enter valid password | Click login button
Expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

Title: Login with incorrect password
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter incorrect password | Click login button
Expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

Title: Account lock after 3 failed login attempts
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter incorrect password | Click login button | Repeat incorrect password entry two more times

Title: Reset password via Forgot Password link
Steps: Navigate to login page | Click on Forgot Password link | Enter registered email | Submit reset request
Expected: Password reset email is sent to the registered email

Title: Error message for empty email field
Steps: Navigate to login page | Leave email field empty | Enter valid password | Click login button
Expected: Error message for empty email is displayed

Title: Error message for empty password field
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Leave password field empty | Click login button
Expected: Error message for empty password is displayed
